abilities.name: Disease of Mirth
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, every enemy unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**) within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: Jolly Gutpipes
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.
